version_description:
• New Cards
• New Achievements
• “Sort by duplicates” button in SBCs
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Get ready for Black Friday promo with New Packs, Player Picks and SBCs! Starts on Friday, November 27th.
• New Achievements
• Bug fixes in the New Trading mode

• Holiday packs! (coming soon)
• Winter theme
• Minor bug fixes
• Holiday Packs, Player Picks and SBCs! Released regularly for the next several weeks!

• In-game Polls. Help us choose new cards and features, and give your feedback!
• TOTY preparation, including new Packs

• New Free Special Pack with 1% chance of TOTY cards. Released 2 times every day!
• Preparation for release of TOTY cards (including new Packs)

New game mode - FATAL!
• Build a Bronze team around an Icon or another elite card
• Play matches against other teams to earn upgrade tokens
• Use the tokens to upgrade your team from Bronze to Silver to Gold, all the way to an all-Special squad
• Earn great rewards, including the players you get while upgrading your team

• TOTY Swap SBCs (released on Saturdays)
• Higher-rated Fatal Foundation card
• Easier way to start New Season in Fatal
• Fatal bug fixes

• New mode - OBJECTIVES. New Objectives and unique cards will be available every week!
• New unique card type - FUTURE ICONS

• New Packs and Player Picks!
• Fatal stats displayed in Latest Cards and My Cards menus
• Objectives conditions displayed in Draft and Pack Opener modes
• New unique card type - MADFUT ICONS (coming soon)
